nodes.name: GovernedAbstract
GovernedAbstract

devdoc.details: This contract is not usable on its own since it does not have any _productive useful_ behaviour The only purpose of this contract is to define some useful modifiers and functions to be used on the governance aspect of the child contract. This contract add the posibility to do a delegate call to any change contract so it can change anything in the storage.
devdoc.title: GovernedAbstract

changeIGovernor(address).notice: Change the contract's governor. Should be called through the old governance system

userdoc.notice: Base contract to be inherited by governed contracts
